ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, partially drained
¼ pound smoked sausage, cut into 1 inch pieces

cookingTips: Select large, firm tomatoes that can hold their shape during baking
Scoop out tomato centers completely but leave the outer shell intact for structure
Bake at 350°F for 20-25 minutes until cheese is melted and tomato is tender but not collapsing
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user on selecting the right tomatoes and properly hollowing them without creating holes, and how to balance moisture from the canned tomatoes.
